institution.bdy:
Termes Olive Oil and Food Co.Ltd., is an extra virgin olive oil producing company based in the K覺z覺lcaova village of Bay覺nd覺r, Izmir, Turkey. The company was founded in 2001 and produces mono-varietal extra virgin olive oils under the brand name Termes.
The product is pure olive oil in its natural state. The process combines traditional methodology with contemporary concerns for food hygiene and nutrition. Though limited in terms of quantity, the production is packaged in various sizes for both local and international markets.
